snippet.title: Project: MARA | Teaser
snippet.description:
Project: MARA is an in-development experimental title that explores new ways of storytelling. 

Project: MARA will be a real-world and grounded representation of mental terror, based on real lived experience accounts and in-depth research with the aim of recreating the horrors of the mind as accurately and realistically as possible.

#projectmara

Follow our journey:
Facebook: @NinjaTheory
Instagram: @OfficialNinjaTheory
Twitter: @NinjaTheory
